sentences.en: He did his best to avert suspicion.
The aim of the current round of talks is to promote free trade and to avert the threat of increasing protectionism.
sentences.cn: 本轮会谈的目的是促进自由贸易，消除日益加剧的贸易保护主义的威胁。

sentences.en: They discovered the danger in time, and made shift to avert it.
sentences.cn: 他们及时发现了危险，并设法避免了。
